info.task: navigate to first focusable element in modal dialog
info.title: Navigate to the first focusable element in a modal dialog

setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusCancelButton
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the 'Cancel' button

user: With focus on the last focusable element inside a modal dialog, navigate to the first focusable element in the same dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on the last focusable element inside a modal dialog, navigate to the first focusable element in the same dialog.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: The ability to enter text is conveyed
